credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Annie Schermerhorn Kane
title: Standing cup and cover
provenance: Ex-col.: Fellix Kranarsky; Museum purchase through gift of Annie Schermerhorn Kane
description:
A) chalice with six double repousse swellings surrounded by wrigglework, gilded, on matching foot.  Stem, urn-shaped with three scrolled handles.  Silver cut and scrolled collars at junctions.
B) Cover, silver-gilt with six swellings and cut and scrolled finial.
name: Standing cup and cover
